data.event: In 2012, Carmel was selected the Best Place to Live in United States by CNN Money magazine.
Carmel was originally called Bethlehem and, under the latter name, was laid out and platted in 1837.
Today, the plot first established in Bethlehem, located at the intersection of Rangeline Road and Main Street, is marked by a clock tower, donated by the local Rotary Club in 2002.

event.title: donated by the local Rotary Club in 2002

data.event: Today, the plot first established in Bethlehem, located at the intersection of Rangeline Road and Main Street, is marked by a clock tower, donated by the local Rotary Club in 2002.
A post office was established as Carmel in 1846.
The town of Bethlehem was renamed Carmel in 1874, at which time it was incorporated.

event.title: 1924, one of the first automatic traffic signals in the U.S. was installed

data.event: In 1924, one of the first automatic traffic signals in the U.S. was installed at the intersection of Main Street and Rangeline Road.
